page.title: 20Recreation in Pennington
page.content: Archery: Every Saturday there is an archery club.The target is made of layers of cardboard so the arrows will go in.It is coloured white,black,blue, red and yellow.The bow is 20grams. Dog shows:My dad takes our dogs to shows at the Memorial Hall.When he comes home he says some of the judges are good and some bad.Our dog wone 2 rosettes. Morris Dancing:My dad is a member of the Furness Morris Men.He wears white trousers and shirt and a green waistcoat.They make their own music and sometimes theyuse sticks in their dances.Football:this is for big boys and men.They have matches nearly every Saturday.Afterwards they drink beer in the Club.Darts Club:At the Wellington pub there is a ladies Darts team.My grandma plays for it.She won a little shield.My mum says I can play in the team when I grow up.
